## Themes

**Spada** has 2 themes:

- Spada

- Dark Spada

### Choosing the Theme

Menu Options > Config

![](../man/figures/articles/themes/themes_menu.png)

Open **Theme**

![](../man/figures/articles/themes/themes_config.png)

Choose the desired Theme and **Apply**. The app will be updated to the choosed theme.

![](../man/figures/articles/themes/themes_dark_spada.png)
